name: Inkgears
description:
"InkGears™" is a 2d puzzle action horror game that begins in the far days past of ink and ends in a very dark future.
Play as Henry as he revisits the demons of his past by exploring the abandoned Creator of a sinister factory's workshop of Piper Helens studio. With twists and turns around every corner, "InkGears" is sure to thrill you... and decimate your childhood.
You'll never look at ink and gears at the same way again.
This first chapter sets the tone for the adventure ahead.
Solve the riddle. Escape the workshop.
Above all, fear the machine and survive.
